item.title: Code Poetry
item.description: Pseudo code poem. if (this === that): try write_new_poem() except not_a_poet as e: return

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I’m Jenny Bryan and I am part of Hadley Wickham’s team at RStudio. We develop open source R packages to make data science faster, easier and more fun. If that sounds intriguing, tidyverse.org is a great place to learn more. Abbreviated CV Education University of California, Berkeley Ph.D. and M.A. in Biostatistics under Mark van der Laan in 2001 Yale University B.A. in Economics and German in 1992 Employment RStudio

item.title: Code
item.description: Most of my software work is done in the open, on GitHub. View my profile: github.com/jennybc I work on the team that maintains the packages in the tidyverse and r-lib organizations. Packages that I specifically maintain or contribute heavily to: reprex readxl googlesheets4, which is replacing googlesheets googledrive usethis gh gapminder repurrrsive cellranger

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I teach a lot. In-person workshops: upcoming What They Forgot to Teach You About R: rstudio::conf 2019 Training Days, 2019 January 15 - 16 in Austin, TX What They Forgot to Teach You About R: Westin Seattle, 2018 October 4 - 5 in Seattle, WA tentative How to repeat yourself with purrr: 2018 September 3, 14:00 - 18:00 at LatinR 2018 in Buenos Aires, Argentina Tutorials, webinars, and the like Row-oriented workflows in R with the tidyverse: RStudio webinar given on 2018 April 11.

item.title: Dear Jane, regarding Mr. Bennet
item.description: Chapter One It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife. However little known the feelings or views of such a man may be on his first entering a neighbourhood, this truth is so well fixed in the minds of the surrounding families, that he is considered the rightful property of some one or other of their daughters.

item.title: Oh, Alice
item.description: Nor did such soothing scenes, however temporary, fail of at least as temporary an effect on Ahab. But if these secret golden keys did seem to open in him his own secret golden treasuries, yet did his breath upon them prove but tarnishing. Alice opened the door and found that it led into a small passage, not much larger than a rat-hole: she knelt down and looked along the passage into the loveliest garden you ever saw.

item.title: A Poem
item.description: Now pleasing sleep had seal’d each mortal eye, Stretch’d in the tents the Grecian leaders lie: The immortals slumber’d on their thrones above; All, but the ever-wakeful eyes of Jove.(76) To honour Thetis’ son he bends his care, And plunge the Greeks in all the woes of war: Then bids an empty phantom rise to sight, And thus commands the vision of the night. “Fly hence, deluding Dream! and light as air,(77)

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
